rooms.description: A spacious lobby that aligns with Vastu by keeping the entrance free from clutter, ensuring positive energy flow. Designed in Art Deco style with geometric patterns.
An open-plan living area featuring classic Art Deco motifs and elegant furniture layout, with a focus on the east-west orientation for optimal sunlight.
A dining space that complements the living room, designed in an Art Deco style with metallic accents and high-quality finishes.
Modern kitchen designed for joint family use, equipped with efficient work areas, following local building norms, and designed to align with Vastu principles by being located in the south direction.
A spacious master bedroom incorporating Art Deco elements such as geometric patterns, rich color palettes, and decorative moldings. Located towards the north to invite positive energy.
A guest room designed with a blend of Art Deco luxury and comfort, ensuring privacy while maintaining family harmony.

An exclusive library space for the joint family to enjoy reading and study. Designed in quiet corners following Vastu guidelines for knowledge accumulation, with ample natural light from windows oriented eastward.
A combined space for storage and service areas including laundry, storage, etc., adhering to local norms and ensuring minimal disruption in energy flow as per Vastu.

openings.description: An Art Deco styled main entrance door with decorative moldings, designed to welcome positive energy while aligning with Vastu principles.
Large windows to allow ample sunlight and natural ventilation in the lobby area.
An opening that provides access from the ground floor to a potential future extension or terrace, designed with Vastu considerations for upward energy flow.
